member.name: DWriteEngine2Events.Update
member.summary: Implement this method to receive progress notification of the current write operation.

param.name: object
param.para: The interface that initiated the write operation.
This parameter is a MsftWriteEngine2 object in script.

param.name: progress
param.para: An interface that you use to determine the progress of the write operation.
This parameter is a MsftWriteEngine2 object in script.

member.name: DWriteEngine2Events
member.summary: Implement this interface to receive notifications of the current write operation.
